duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform analysis of healthcare data and write reports that explain technical concepts clearly to a non-technical audience
Manage projects through completion within an expected budget and supervise actuarial students in the completion of technical aspects of actuarial projects
Develop the ability to manage client relationships, and successfully generate new business with both new and existing clients

education_certification.credential: Bachelor’s degree in mathematics, statistics, economics, or a related field, ASA designation, 4-10 years of healthcare actuarial experience with Two or more years of experience with Medicare Advantage
